name: On The Way Home (Zachary3608)
description:
Gooba is a deodorant tester, one day during work, He tested a deodorant where he started to hallucinate. On medical leave he went back home. However his boss is sneakily following him from behind to get him back to work.

The game’s main objective is to get Gooba home without collapsing on the ground.

Make sure Gooba gets home by completing micro-games. Each game will increase in difficulty as the level goes on. If you lose any of the games you must start from the beginning.
